gesture_midi_mappings.description: MIDI CC mappings for gesture control effects

mappings.name: Filter Cutoff/Brightness
mappings.notes: Left = dark/closed filter, Right = bright/open filter

mappings.name: Filter Resonance
mappings.notes: Pinch close = low resonance, spread = high resonance

mappings.name: Expression
mappings.notes: Currently unused, can be mapped to hand velocity

ableton_live.step_4: Create Audio Effects Rack on an audio track
ableton_live.step_5: Add Auto Filter (map Frequency to CC74, Resonance to CC71)
ableton_live.step_8: Route MIDI from Track 2 → Track 1 (CC only)

logic_pro.step_2: Set MIDI Input to 'RNN Music Generator'
logic_pro.step_4: Add Channel EQ → Assign CC74 to Frequency
logic_pro.step_5: Add Space Designer/Reverb → Assign CC91 to Wet
logic_pro.step_6: Add Chorus → Assign CC93 to Mix
logic_pro.step_7: Use Smart Controls for MIDI Learn

fl_studio.step_5: Right-click effect parameter → Link to controller
fl_studio.note: FL Studio has excellent MIDI Learn support

studio_one.step_2: Set MIDI Input to 'RNN Music Generator'
studio_one.step_5: Map CC numbers to effect parameters
studio_one.step_6: Enable 'Follow' on track for MIDI Learn

reaper.step_2: Set input to MIDI: RNN Music Generator
reaper.step_6: Move hand to send CC message
reaper.note: Reaper has flexible MIDI routing options

recommended_effects_chain.signal_flow: Instrument → Filter → Modulation → Chorus → Reverb → Output

tips.latency: Use low-latency mode in DAW if available
tips.buffer_size: Set audio buffer to 128-256 samples for real-time control
tips.midi_channel: All CC messages sent on channel 0 (can be changed in code)
tips.update_rate: 20Hz update rate balances responsiveness and CPU
tips.gesture_priority: Gestures override continuous position control temporarily

testing.test_cc_74: Move hand left-right, observe filter sweep
testing.test_cc_91: Move hand up-down, observe reverb increase
testing.midi_monitor: Use MIDI monitor to verify CC messages are sent
